TopicTitle: [0.19.1] - STAR Supreme BUS & STAR Fight Series - Two new crafts for the STAR Series!

Articles.Content:
So, for those who knows the STAR Series, and already use it, here i have two new crafts for the STAR Series.

The STAR Supreme BUS, a 5 crew Space Bus, with a long range capabilities. Perfect to take Kerbins to Laythe ground. (With refuels in Kerbin Orbit and on Laythe Orbit.)

The Second, a STAR Fight, This one is capable of Manual flight, and is stable for use without MechJeb. This one is configured for power and speed, capable of orbit with 1000 m/s of dV resting on tank. All STAR Series lift off and land vertically.

Have Fun.

STAR Supreme BUS - https://www.dropbox.com/s/och3g3akmhyroti/STAR%20Supreme%20BUS.craft

STAR Supreme BUS Mj - https://www.dropbox.com/s/0x5bj6qf4ok7v0a/STAR%20Supreme%20BUS%20Mj.craft

STAR Fight - https://www.dropbox.com/s/zutq8tzu6zeoy0r/STAR%20Fight.craft

STAR Fight Mj - https://www.dropbox.com/s/d7bwebdwa9ui65z/STAR%20Fight%20Mj.craft

Edited May 13, 2013 by Climberfx
Love this SSTO, it's a very striking design and seems to be pretty functional. The shot of the two variants next to one another is great!

Thanks. It's great! I update with a video. On the way back, you can choose to come in front or back. The video i show the front version.

Son i post a video to land from forward. (Is just slow to 50%, near ground, then pitch 90Ã‚Âº, slow down and land...)
Is it stable in the atmosphere? I once tried to build a similar looking aircraft but it would always dive and crash into the ground.

All the STAR Series are made to use for get an orbit fast and do maneuvers, perform in space. some are Interplanetary. Not to fly around in Atmosphere. And to avoid the flame out and optimize flight/Fuel, use it with MechJeb.

But one time a guy fell interested in have a STAR that could fly around, and for that i did this STAR Fight. It flies around and still go into orbit. The only thing you must do to not loose control, is not to go to far from the center on navball. The video show it flying around before noose up to orbit. This is because they have the ability to come back from space by front or back.

Edited May 14, 2013 by Climberfx
Loocas, try it, you will see that it flies like a "Rock", lol...
